```{r}
library(dplyr)
```

# Question 1
```{r}
library(readr)
grades <- read_csv("grades.csv")
```

# Question 2
```{r}
  sentence <- paste("The data set contains", nrow(grades), "grades.")
  print(sentence)
```

# Question 3
```{r}
num_distinct_students <- grades |>
  distinct(id) |>
  nrow()  

sentence <- paste("The data set contains", num_distinct_students, "distinct students.")
print(sentence)  
```
